# GraphQL MCP Documentation

Welcome to the GraphQL MCP documentation! This guide will help you get started with building MCP servers from GraphQL APIs.

## Getting Started

New to GraphQL MCP? Start here:

- **[Getting Started](getting-started/)** - Quick introduction and basic usage
- **[Installation](installation/)** - How to install and set up GraphQL MCP

## Core Concepts

Learn about the key features:

- **[Configuration](configuration/)** - Configure your MCP server
- **[Remote GraphQL](remote-graphql/)** - Connect to existing GraphQL APIs
- **[MCP Inspector](mcp-inspector/)** - Test and debug your tools

## Reference

- **[API Reference](api-reference/)** - Complete API documentation
- **[Examples](examples/)** - Real-world usage examples
